sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Ski center will be open on 2/15 and 2/16.  Golf course and Shelden Trails are currently groomed.  Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.

Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for skate and classic skiing today, February 16, 2025 . There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails. No trails on the golf course.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: –  For today, February 16, 2025 grooming for classic ski and skate ski will take place on Coyote Run and Hawks Hill while Cedar Trace will be rolled only.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Being the very first on the groom today , I am biased : but boy oh boy it is nice at Nubs Nob ! LF 6

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Skated the golf course this morning.  Skating was great, a little soft in spots, some grassy stubble, but no complaints!  Groomer was setting classic tracks on Coyote while I was there, they looked very grassy, so would not recommend classic (except on Buck's) unless you like skiing in the skate lane.  Cedar trace was also rolled.  Hawk's (south golf course) was pretty great for skate, but I skipped the "grotto of tears" which looked too hairy for me.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: All 8 lifts, Rope Tow, and the Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open and in great shape. All trails will be groomed and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Special Night skiing session from 5:30 to 9:00 PM tonight!
nubsNob.comments: It's a great day to ski or ride at Nub's Nob. Over four inches of snow fell on the slopes yesterday and last night. The majority of that fresh snow has now been groomed into the base further improving conditions. The slopes, XC trails, and the snowshoe trail are all in mid-winter condition. Chairlifts will be spinning from 9 AM to 9 PM today with an hour break at 4:30 PM to groom for night skiing. Eric Jaqua will play the Nub's Pub at 3:30 PM. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with a deli and an espresso bar until 3:30 PM. Bundle up and make it a great day at Nub's Nob!
